Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Hmm this is a detailed process description with multiple stakeholders and decision points The user wants open ended questions to uncover gaps without diving into technical implementation

Name: Abductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The process seems to have clear phases but lacks clarity on triggers decision logic and exception handling

Name: Heuristic Reasoning - PE
Text: I should structure questions around the lifecycle initiation documentation assignment inspection marketing and tenant onboarding

Name: Hypothesis Generation - PE
Text: For each phase I can probe about ownership who makes decisions criteria how choices are made timing sequence dependencies and exceptions what happens when things go wrong

Name: Deductive Reasoning - IND
Text: The questions should avoid yes no answers and instead invite elaboration

Name: Inductive Reasoning - PE
Text: The response should flow naturally from high level process initiation to specific edge cases mirroring the interviewees original description while digging deeper into their operational reality
